response.overview: First episode of the documentary series #Ferro.via Amazônia, presents narratives of citizens criminally prosecuted by Mineradora Vale S/A, after having participated in demonstrations against situations involving the company. Subjects as different from each other as the university professor Evandro Medeiros, from Pará, the residents of a neighborhood crossed by the Estrada de Ferro Carajás (EFC), Waldir Gonçalves and João Reis Saraiva, also in Pará, and the retired rural worker Dona Nicinha, from Maranhão, are some of the characters in this film, which exposes not only the context that led them to be sued by the company, but also their trajectories in court and the consequences of legal actions in their daily lives.
response.title: Processados
